name: Empires:The Rise
description:
《Empries:The Rise》 is the a classical Real-Time-Strategy (R.T.S.) game. The game is designed to play on the cross-platforms, to restore war sandbox experiences, with localized play & control.

APM is no longer a problem. Micro-controls are simplified; and with built-in single unit AI, you are able to command your army with ease.

An average game will usually between 5-20 minutes. In this focused time, you can experience the war from all angles: Gathering, management, battles.

The nature of R.T.S. game is this kind of competitive game play. Ranked 1v1 matches, 2v2, 3v3 game plays are supported. There will be limited time for 4 people Free-For-All, unbalanced challenge etc.
